attributes.action: Keep Southlands Hospital open as a Community Hospital
attributes.additional_details:
Stop Southlands Hospital in Shoreham from closing and allow it to become a Community Hospital providing much needed community services for the area. Community hospital beds are desperately needed for the area including pallative care and rehabilitation beds.  Care in patient's homes is not adequate and care in good nursing homes is in short supply and too expensive in the area.
A Minor Injuries Unit should also be provided to ease the long waits in the local acute hospital A/E in Worthing.
